article:
Whilst most compounds are referred to by their IUPAC systematic names (following
IUPAC nomenclature), "traditional" names have also been kept where they are in
wide use or of significant historical interests.

See also: Dictionary of chemical formulas, inorganic compounds by element, named
inorganic compounds, list of compounds, list of organic compounds, organic
compound, list of biomolecules, list of minerals, polyatomic ions, list of
elements by name, List of alchemical substances.
